markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Garuda's Squall](/Feats.aspx?ID=2286) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Plumekith](/Feats.aspx?ID=2285)

</column>

---

[Garudas'](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1162) marksmanship and magic are second nature to you. Whenever you critically hit using a bow, you apply the weapon's [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).
name: Garuda's Squall
